ygData.subject: Re: Anyone else see this on lung? 50 charges goes to 1 when you give it to someone?
ygData.msgSnippet: The fact that the observer staff does that was a bug also.. it has been rectified however... the observer staff stays at 50 charges after being traded now.
ygData.messageBody:
The fact that the observer staff does that "was" a bug also.. it has been
rectified however... the observer staff stays at 50 charges after being
traded now.
----- Original Message -----
From: Zinken <zinken@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, November 04, 1999 12:31 PM
Subject: SV: [EQ_Tinkering] Anyone else see this on lung? 50 charges goes to
1 when you give it to someone?


> From: "Zinken" <zinken@...>
>
> I havent made one yet tho i can connect at all since yesterday :-(((. But
if you have made an Observer staff any time you know itï¿½s the same with
that, when you get it it had 50 charges if you dropp it on the ground or
trade it it resets to 1. Tho in this case i dont mind ppl will trade the
lens instead of the staff if they are after the staff for the spell, most
ppl arent tho. But in the case with the aqua lung it must be a bug. We need
to petition about this and do it fast !!!
>
>
> Askur Worried Gnome of Veeshan
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: <sragan@...>
> To: <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
> Sent: Thursday, November 04, 1999 5:55 PM
> Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] Anyone else see this on lung? 50 charges goes to 1
when you give it to someone?
>
>
> > From: sragan@...
> >
> >
> > Hi Folks,
> >
> > Now I know for sure that the aqua lung had 50 charges on it when I first
made it. After I gave it to a friend, the thing only had a single charge!!!
> >
> > Anyone else seen this? Is this a bug or a feature!
> >
> > Ack.
> >
> > FizzWizz of tunare
> >
> >
>
>
